title: Is it better to win or to lose? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on your goal for competing in the first place. Depends on your motives and goals. You decide. I can’t decide for you. I love to win races, because I am fast, and I want to have other people be amazed at me. That’s my goal. Winning helps me accomplish that goal. I compete to win. You might not, and therefore think it better to lose. It is all perspective.

As Sun Tzu said: “If you know both yourself and your enemy, in every battle you will achieve excellence” “If you know yourself but not the enemy, for every victory you gain you will also suffer a defeat” “If you know neither yourself or your enemy, you will succumb in every battle”
